name: Naturally Obedient
description: On recruiting this Follower immediately gain 10 Faith.

name: Faithful
description: Generates Devotion 15% faster. Mutually exclusive with Faithless.

name: Faithless
description: Gain 5 Faith when another Cult member becomes ill. Note: Max 1

name: Strong Constitution
description: Heals 15% faster when sick and in bed rest.

name: Zealous
description: Ignores dissenters when they preach.

name: Materialistic
description: Gain Faith when building better sleeping quarters.

name: Gullible
description: Follower receives extra +15% from all Loyalty sources. Mutually exclusive with Cynical.

name: Germaphobe
description: Gain 10 Faith when falling ill. Won't vomit when seeing poop or vomit. Mutually exclusive with Germaphobe.

name: Industrious
description: Increase work speed by 15%.

name: Immortal
description: Will never reach old age.

name: Don't Starve
description: Will never starve.

name: Royal Pooper
description: All poops are golden.

name: Lustful
description: Very...affectionate towards other Followers.

name: Fashionable
description: Generates Devotion 20% faster when wearing a unique outfit.

name: Hedonist
description: Decreases productivity by 10% but increases Sin generation by 15%.

name: Ascetic
description: Decreases Sin generation by 10% but increases productivity by 15%.

name: Unrepentant
description: Produces Sin 15% faster.

name: Pettable
description: Can be pet regardless of the follower's form.

name: Polyamorous
description: Never gets jealous of other spouse from them; cannot get other wedding related traits upon getting married.

name: Cynical
description: 15% harder to level up.

name: Faithless
description: Generates Devotion 15% slower.

name: Germaphobe
description: Lose 10 Faith when falling ill.

name: Natural Skeptic
description: On recruiting Follower immediately lose 10 Faith.

name: Sickly
description: Heals 15% slower when sick and in bed rest.

name: Sloth
description: Work and devotion generation speed reduced by 10%.

name: Terrified of Death
description: Lose -5 Faith whenever another Follower dies.

name: Against Sacrifice
description: -5 Faith when a Follower is Sacrificed.
